page.title: 04TRADE
page.content: for the worse and that it spoiled the effect of a village green.The main changes which people would like to see were alternative parking facilities off the High St. and the provision of a local store in the old part of the village for everyday needs.Sir George Young felt that there was a need for some public tennis courts and perhaps a swimming pool and he regretted the fact that the children of local people found it hard to stay in the area because of the high cost of housing. It was interesting to talk to an {American Doctor}and his wife who were visiting the village. He had been billettedat the{Odney Club}before{D {Day}and remembered the barrier on the river road manned by the{Home Guard}to protect the village in the event of an invasion.He said the river was cleaner then and they swam in the May of 1944.
